local_intent: Perceive red_plate, move above and align, lower until contact, open gripper to release white_plate, verify release, retreat.
assumptions: white_plate is currently held by the gripper
red_plate is within reachable workspace and can be perceived or discovered by scanning
environment stable for lowering and release
coherence_with_global: Realizes the transfer phase from GLOBAL_BT and GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION: perception of the red plate, approach/align, lowering to contact, release of the white plate, verification that the plate is no longer in the gripper, and a short retreat to avoid collisions.
